sect1.para: On this page you will find a summary of significant changes to NetBSD. For those interested in every change to the source tree, there is no substitute for subscribing to the source-changes mailing list. Significant news related to the NetBSD Project is also included here. Changes to pkgsrc are also listed here. All of this information is also available in rss/xml format.

itemizedlist.listitem: Significant Source changes from NetBSD 5.0 to 6.0 (Updated nightly)
Significant Source changes from NetBSD 4.0 to 5.0 (Updated nightly)

sect3.title: 01 Mar 2010 - New Developers
sect3.para: The NetBSD project is pleased to welcome the following new developers:

itemizedlist.listitem: &a.cnst; (login: cnst), who will be working on sysmon, envsys and kernel.
&a.morr; (login: morr), who will be working on the NetBSD Packages Collection and pl mirror.

sect3.title: 16 Feb 2010 - Hackathon February 19-22 2010
sect3.para: NetBSD community is running the 13th Hackathon February 19-22 2010. All supporters of NetBSD are invited to join the developers on IRC channel #netbsd-code at FreeNode (irc.freenode.net).
Please see the Hackathon page for details and updates:

sect3.title: 12 Feb 2010 - NetBSD 5.0.2 released
sect3.para: The NetBSD release engineering team has announced that the NetBSD 5.0.2 release is now available for download. NetBSD 5.0.2 is the second critical/security update of the NetBSD 5.0 release branch. It represents a selected subset of fixes deemed critical for security or stability reasons. All users are encouraged to upgrade. See the NetBSD 5.0.2 Release Announcement for more information.

sect3.title: 02 Feb 2010 - New Security Advisory: NetBSD-SA2010-003 azalia(4)/hdaudio(4) negative mixer index panic
sect3.para: One new security advisory was published:

itemizedlist.listitem: NetBSD-SA2010-003 azalia(4)/hdaudio(4) negative mixer index panic

sect3.para: You can find more information about them on the Security and NetBSD page.

sect3.title: 01 Feb 2010 - New Developers
sect3.para: The NetBSD project is pleased to welcome the following new developers:

itemizedlist.listitem: &a.gls; (login: gls), who will be working on the NetBSD Packages Collection and advocacy (French).
&a.minh; (login: minh), who will be working on xmltools.
&a.yhardy; (login: yhardy), who will be working on acpi and drm.

sect3.title: 13 Jan 2010 - New Security Advisories: NetBSD-SA2010-001 (Module autoloading) and NetBSD-SA2010-002 (OpenSSL)
sect3.para: Two new security advisories were published:

itemizedlist.listitem: NetBSD-SA2010-001 File system module autoloading Denial of Service attack
NetBSD-SA2010-002 OpenSSL TLS renegotiation man in the middle vulnerability

sect3.para: You can find more information about them on the Security and NetBSD page.

sect3.title: 01 Jan 2010 - New Developer in December 2009
sect3.para: The NetBSD project is pleased to welcome the following new developer:

itemizedlist.listitem: &a.jruoho; (login: jruoho), who will be working on kernel, device drivers and power management/ACPI.
